commit_list.message:
Proxy all ClientActions via client by method_missing

Any action that client sends, that normally would be an unknown method,
will be checked (and if applicable) delegated to client action.

Methods ending with a bang, will be delegated without bang, and in turn,
#success! on the result is invoked. If no bang is returned, result is
returned as-is.

Description + wxASSERT. Events are invoked by main thread, on the datasources own thread!

Don't re-create the QueryResult every time the View is changed.

More progress on getting threading working.

The datasource(s) is executed as a thread. Datasource is currently only
listserver. Datasource fetches data and queues them for a DataController. The
task of the DataController is to read these data and store them and possible
update QueryResult sets, so the GUI can be updated appropiately. The
implementation is still very experimental.
Added Queue class which is threadsafe
QueryResult moved into its own files.

DataController now also controls the QueryResults

The idea is, that since DataController gets new data, it will be able to
build a queue with new changes for each QueryResult, which can be read
and processed when GUI permits it.
Added some asserts to validate some assumptions on who is calling its method (main thread or workers)

Makefile is not splitted in two: "make pre" will generate gui.cpp/gui.h and perform png->c conversion. While "make all" assumes these exists (thereby avoiding that everyone that wanna compile bzlauncher needs to install/execute wxformbuilder and bin2c)

Added Favorite functionality:
 - toggle favorite

Only accept BZFS0026 (for now). If anything else is found, it dosnt dare to parse the hex-info. New colors for the list:
- black = active server
- red   = unsupported
- blue  = server is full
- grey  = server is empty

Added optional executable for bzflag. If you are an adventurer, you can change the config-file manually and add how bzflag executed (parameters). bzflag/default controls default behaviour (if missing 'bzflag %s' is used). Add bzflag/bzfs0026 if you want special command for bzfs0026 servers.

Im moving to a new computer, and while rsync were running I worked on
this. Just to make sure everything was moved correctly, and ran it an
extra time.. which restored the old repository. So this commit contains
everything made in the last hour or so.

- make game object available to actions and actors instead of level
- let actors decide what happens when killed
- when bomberman dies - then do no try to control it (no more dropping
  bombs while dead)
- schedule actions - allows bomberman when killed, to respawn a bit
  later
Chain reactions - flames from exploding bombs will make other bombs explode if hit
